text: Thomas Metzger (born 26 February 1959) is an Austrian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Austria Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vienna
title: Thomas Metzger (equestrian)
